attributes.action: Organise a Home Nations football tournament during the summer of the European Championships 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the lack of qualification of all of the British and Irish teams for next year’s European Championship finals we propose that an alternative tournament is organised. The Five Nations of Football tournament would feature England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and Republic of Ireland teams in a round robin style tournament similar to the six nations that is played every year in rugby union. The matches would be held at each nation's home ground and every team would play two matches home and two matches away. This tournament would also generate interest in football and be important for the economy in a summer where an estimated £1bn will be lost due to the lack of interest in the European Championship.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
